name: HyperDisc
description:
DEVELOPMENT IS CURRENTLY ON HOLD.

Work is keeping me far too busy to be able to push this project farther along, so don't expect more updates in the near future. I do plan to develop this project when my schedule loosens up and I can devote more time to programming and gaining a better understanding of networking in multiplayer games.

HyperDisc is a futuristic multiplayer ultimate frisbee game.

Here's the official release trailer.

I'm currently making this game by myself, so if you have any questions, comments, or concerns, you can post to the subreddit here. and I will read it.

Check out the website here where I may post some devlogs if anyone is interested in them.

The first $100 made will go directly to submitting this game to Steam Greenlight, after that money will go to getting dedicated servers up and running for the game, along with supporting myself.

ALPHA 02

- New Field Design.

- Windows, Mac OSX, and Linux builds now included.

- Updated Controls.txt
